body_html:
@mrry has a great script to help diagnose these problems. What are the results of that?

Check out this post here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/42011070/

These problems are often caused by the MSVCP140.DLL not being installed and/or in your path.

(Side bar: Are you installing tensorflow in the root of your anaconda and then accessing it through an environment or all through root?)

body:
@mrry has a great script to help diagnose these problems. What are the results of that?

Check out this post here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/42011070/

These problems are often caused by the MSVCP140.DLL not being installed and/or in your path. 

(Side bar: Are you installing tensorflow in the root of your anaconda and then accessing it through an environment or all through root?)
